text: Toto isadaka niya Abatakha nende Abamanani, nende balia bakholanga khu sadaka eyo, nende balia benya okhutinyisibwa mubusuubili, nende okhununula Abarumwa, nende Ababanzwa, nende bali khunjila ya Nyasaye, nende Ababiyilwe khuluchendo eshilachilo okhurula khu Nyasaye, Ne Nyasaye ni Omumanyi Owamachesi muno
